atama thambaayakata mayim nokara deyak thamayi oya yanthara manthara kiyana jathiya , ee kiyanne owwa boruyi kiyala atama wishwasa karanawa kiyana eka nemeyi, oya sambandayen atamage mathaya thamayi , owwa korala palak na kiyana eka, atan goyiya ithin buddhagan karayane, bohoma aasawen daham pasal ehema gihin bana dahan ehema igana gena thiyana eka , awasana wibhageta nan ida gaththe na , daham pasal guruwarayek wechcha bothal paththara karayek handa , ( ookata kiyanda namak mata hitha ganda ba) wal balla mage kellawa rawattala udura gaththa handa mama anthima masa kihipaya daham pasal nogihin atha ariya,
